column3:
ごめんよ今は訳あって
ゲルド宝飾店は準備中なんだ
ナボリスってのが出てきて外は危険だし
宮殿も泥棒騒ぎで大変だし その上店も…
そんなこんなで この街は
最近トラブル続きなんだ… まいったよ
column4:
I'm sorry, but the Gerudo Jewelers isn't
open right now...

With that beast causing a ruckus and
the guards in an uproar over some kind
of theft, things have been pretty crazy.
And on top of it all, my shop...


The village is facing quite a few
problems lately. *sigh*

column3:
お嬢ちゃんが火打ち石を
持ってきてくれたんだってね
いや～助かったよ

お礼に オーナーの秘密教えてあげようか？
column4:
I heard you brought some flint for us,
little vai.

You're a lifesaver!


How about...I tell you one of the owner's secrets
as my way of saying sarqso?

column3:
オーナーはさ…

寝る時に身に着けるものはアクセサリー
だけなんだって
お腹冷えないのかな…
column4:
I heard the owner...
sleeps wearing nothing...
but accessories...
I wonder if she gets cold...

column3:
オーナーの名前って実は偽名でさ
実は ジュエルって名前なんだ
宝飾屋でジュエルなんて
あからさますぎて恥ずかしいんだってさ
私は良い名前だと思うけどね…
column4:
The owner's name is actually an alias. Her real
name is Jewel.

It's a little too coincidental for a jeweler to be
named Jewel, so she was embarrassed.

I think it's a fine name, personally...

column3:
オーナーって何もしてないって言ってるけど
週1 アローマさんのエステに通ってるんだ
「何もしてない」なんて言ってる美人ほど
信用できないものはないよね
column4:
The owner claims that she's not doing anything
special with her looks, but she actually visits
Hotel Oasis once a week.
It's always good to remember... If someone says
they don't do anything at all to maintain their
looks, it's probably not quite true.

column3:
恋愛教室のワーシャ先生と
ヴォーイを取り合った過去があるんだって
まぁ どっちもまだ独身だから
どっちも ダメだったんだろうね…
column4:
Apparently she and the teacher of the relationship
class, Ashai, were embroiled in a tragic love
triangle...
They're both still single, so I guess we know how
that went...

column3:
お嬢ちゃんはこの店の恩人だ

アンタの注文なら いつもより
気合入れて作るから
気に入ったアクセサリーがあったら
遠慮なく手に取って見てってよ
column4:
This shop owes you everything, young
vai. Your requests fill us with a greater
sense of purpose than normal!
If you see an accessory you like, please
feel free to pick it up and look at it.

column3:
ごめんよ今は訳あって
ゲルド宝飾店は準備中なんだ
兜泥棒の騒ぎはおさまったとはいえ
ナボリスってのが出てきて外は危険だし
その上店も…

そんなこんなで この街は
最近トラブル続きなんだ… まいったよ
column4:
I'm sorry, but the Gerudo Jewelers isn't
open right now...

The big theft seems to have been solved,
but Naboris is out there causing a
ruckus, so it's dangerous to travel.
And on top of it all, my shop...


The village is facing quite a few
problems lately. *sigh*

column3:
ごめんよ今は訳あって
ゲルド宝飾店は準備中なんだ
兜泥棒の騒ぎもおさまったし
ナボリスってのも大人しくなったとはいえ
店がこれじゃあね…

ほんと まいったよ
column4:
I'm sorry, but the Gerudo Jewelers isn't
open right now...

Naboris has calmed down, and the whole
thing with the thieves has resolved...

But my shop...
What to do, what to do. *sigh*
